name: busca_por_simbolo
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool alpha_vantage.
Tool description: Bolsa de valores
API description: Fetches data for a given stock symbol using the Alpha Vantage API.

function.description: The type of function to be called in the API (e.g., 'TIME_SERIES_DAILY').

apikey.description: The API key for accessing Alpha Vantage API.

outputsize.description: The size of the data output (e.g., 'compact' or 'full').

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which data is to be fetched.
